root.name: Cyber Tiger
root.description: OverviewThis is the only game, other than the Tiger Woods PGA Tour series, to feature Tiger Woods as a playable character. It is also one of the first golf games to make use of the "analog swing". The game strikes an excellent balance by combining both simulation and arcade elements to create, what was once, a unique golf experience.
